title: Performance Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Performance domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

title.description: The name or title of the performance metric

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the performance metric entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the performance metric within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the performance metric

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the performance metric is linked

rationales.description: References to rationale IDs explaining the strategic motivation for each KPI or performance goal.

inputs.description: The resources information or materials required for the performance metric

outputs.description: The deliverables or results produced by the performance metric

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the effectiveness and efficiency of the performance metric

dependencies.description: Other metrics processes or systems that the performance metric depends on

relatedPerformanceMetrics.description: Performance metrics that are related or linked to this metric

maturityLevel.description: The current maturity level of the performance metric

toolsAndTechnologies.description: Tools and technologies used to support or enable the performance metric

complianceAndStandards.description: Regulatory requirements and standards the performance metric must adhere to

cost.description: The financial cost associated with implementing and maintaining the performance metric

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the performance metric and its operations

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the performance metric can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the performance metric aligns with the Organizations strategic goals and objectives

title.description: The name or title of the Performance KPI

parent.description: The Performance outcome the Performance KPI is related to

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Performance KPI entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Performance KPI within the performance measurement framework

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Performance KPI

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) responsible for tracking the KPI

measurementMethod.description: How the Performance KPI is measured

targets.description: Specific targets or benchmarks for the Performance KPI

frequency.description: How often the Performance KPI is measured and reported

dataSource.description: The source of data for the Performance KPI measurement

relatedKPIs.description: KPIs that are related or linked to this Performance KPI

dependencies.description: Other Performance KPIs processes or systems that the Performance KPI depends on

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Performance KPI measurement and its interpretation

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Performance KPI measurement can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Performance KPI aligns with the Organizations strategic goals and objectives
